doc.title: Cannes: The Agony and the Ecstasy
doc.plot: Behind the scenes at the Cannes Film Festival, following 5 people over a 2 year period. Nik Powell, infamous UK producer, Stephan Elliot, flamboyant Aussie director, Baz Bamigboye, unstoppable journo, the Highway Prostitute and the very private hotel concierge. This roller-coaster, fly-on-the-wall documentary takes an unglamorous look at the most insane film festival in the world.
